ApproxsimClient.filter
Class ActivityTimeFilter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.filter.ApproxsimObjectFilter
      ApproxsimClient.filter.ActivityTimeFilter

public class ActivityTimeFilter
extends ApproxsimObjectFilter

ActivityTimeFilter passes objects of Activity type depending on theirs occurence in time.
